subject: Fwd: Order #SSN3008
description_text:
Hi! Seems like service@simsonn.com is not working, because I've got
ignored for a week already. I would like to get answers for my ticket. You
can find It in forwarded emails below.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
От: Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>
Date: вт, 25 нояб. 2025 г. в 15:40
Subject: Re: Order #SSN3008
To: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>


Hi! I'm just trying to understand is package got lost, or what happened to
it? I still don't understand why it was sent via regular Deutschland Post
(aka DHL) and not with DHL Express... Previously, I've been ready to order
more peripherals from your website, but after that, I'm really thinking
about looking more on Simagic solutions.

пн, 24 нояб. 2025 г. в 09:57, Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>:

> Hi, any updates about the pedals? The waiting time is getting really
> ridiculous, it's more than a month have been passed after I ordered them...
>
> пт, 21 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:57, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>:
>
>> Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,
>>
>> We sincerely apologize for this unusual situation. Typically, DHL
>> shipments take only 3-4 days. We will investigate this matter promptly and
>> provide compensation. We apologize for any inconvenience caused!
>>
>> On Thu, 20 Nov at 9:10 AM , Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>
>> wrote:
>> Hi, I just remind you, that I paid for the express delivery, and my
>> parcel stuck in one status for 12 days already. For what I've paid for? For
>> me, it seems like your employees from Germany just send my package through
>> a regular post system. It's not normal to take money for delivery and then
>> use free shipping options instead.
>>
>> [image: image.png]
>>
>> сб, 8 нояб. 2025 г. в 00:54, Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>:
>>
>>> Hi, I'm finally got a tracking number. And the parcel was sent via
>>> regular DHL, not DHL Express. I've paid for the fastest delivery, and I
>>> have huge concerns about Deutsche Post speed and service quality.
>>> It's already almost a month I've been waiting my order. Why should I pay
>>> extra $30 for shipping if it anyway will take such a crazy time to
>>> be delivered and why you are saying that it was sent by DHL Express if
>>> it not? The difference is huge between those companies.
>>>
>>> [image: image.png]
>>>
>>> ср, 5 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:34, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>:
>>>
>>>> Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,
>>>>
>>>> We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for your
>>>> order to be shipped from our German warehouse, but the tracking number has
>>>> not yet been generated. We will immediately contact our German warehouse
>>>> staff to confirm the order status.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> On Tue, 4 Nov at 10:51 AM , Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>
>>>> wrote:
>>>> Hi, could you share with me tracking number if pedals already shipped?
>>>> Thank you!
>>>>
>>>> пт, 31 окт. 2025 г. в 12:05, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>:
>>>>
>>>>> Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,
>>>>>
>>>>> Your pedals have been scheduled for shipment, but our German warehouse
>>>>> is closed for Reformation Day (public holiday) and will ship your order
>>>>> next Monday. We use DHL Express, and delivery is expected around the 7th.
>>>>>
>>>>> On Fri, 31 Oct at 12:02 PM , Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>
>>>>> wrote:
>>>>> Hi! Address is correct, it’s just awful Cyprus delivery services, I’m
>>>>> gonna try to collect package by myself at their office today. Thank you!
>>>>>
>>>>> P.S. is there are any updates about pedals shipment?
>>>>>
>>>>> On Fri, 31 Oct 2025 at 11:59, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
>> wrote:
>>
>>> Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,
>>>
>>> I noticed your package delivery failed. Please confirm that your address
>>> is complete.
>>> Vladislav Bebchuk
>>> Agias Paraskevis 6
>>> <https://www.google.com/maps/search/Agias+Paraskevis+6+%0D%0D%0A+apt.101+%0D%0D%0A+8046+Paphos+%0D%0D%0A+Cyprus?entry=gmail&source=g>
